      • getManifest

        @GET
 @Path(value="/{pi}/manifest")
 @Produces(value="application/json")
public IPresentationModelElement getManifest(@PathParam(value="pi")
                                                                                                                      java.lang.String pi)
                                                                                                               throws PresentationException,
                                                                                                                      IndexUnreachableException,
                                                                                                                      java.net.URISyntaxException,
                                                                                                                      ViewerConfigurationException,
                                                                                                                      DAOException,
                                                                                                                      de.unigoettingen.sub.commons.contentlib.exceptions.ContentNotFoundException
        Returns the entire IIIF manifest for the given pi. If the given pi points to an anchor, a IIIF collection is returned instead
        Parameters:
        pi -
        Returns:
        The manifest or collection
        Throws:
        PresentationException
        IndexUnreachableException
        java.net.URISyntaxException
        ViewerConfigurationException
        DAOException
        de.unigoettingen.sub.commons.contentlib.exceptions.ContentNotFoundException - If no object with the given pi was found in the index

 @Produces(value="application/json")
public AnnotationList getOtherContent(@PathParam(value="pi")

      • getLayer

        @GET
 @Path(value="/{pi}/layer/{type}")
 @Produces(value="application/json")
public Layer getLayer(@PathParam(value="pi")
                                                                                                   java.lang.String pi,
                                                                                                   @PathParam(value="type")
                                                                                                   java.lang.String typeName)
                                                                                            throws PresentationException,
                                                                                                   IndexUnreachableException,
                                                                                                   java.net.URISyntaxException,
                                                                                                   ViewerConfigurationException,
                                                                                                   DAOException,
                                                                                                   de.unigoettingen.sub.commons.contentlib.exceptions.ContentNotFoundException,
                                                                                                   de.unigoettingen.sub.commons.contentlib.exceptions.IllegalRequestException,
                                                                                                   java.io.IOException
        Creates a layer containing all annnotations of the given type for the work with the given pi. The annotations are groupd into annotation lists by page, if they belong to a page. Otherwise they are grouped in a single annotation list
        Parameters:
        pi - The pi of the containing work
        typeName - The name of the AnnotationType for which annotations should be returned
        Returns:
        A IIIF layer
        Throws:
        PresentationException
        IndexUnreachableException
        java.net.URISyntaxException
        ViewerConfigurationException
        DAOException
        de.unigoettingen.sub.commons.contentlib.exceptions.ContentNotFoundException - If there is no work with the given pi
        de.unigoettingen.sub.commons.contentlib.exceptions.IllegalRequestException - If there is no annotation type of the given name
        java.io.IOException
